title: PAE Website
description: During my internship, I developed a website using ReactJS, next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Blur Face
description: A project that explores the process of blurring artificial intelligence, presented as a university term paper. I developed the front-end of this website using Django.

title: Riot Twitch Bot
description: We are collaborating on a Twitch chatbot that utilizes Node.js and the Axios library to access the Riot Games API. The chatbot aims to furnish Twitch viewers with up-to-date in-game data for both 'League of Legends' and 'Teamfight Tactics' matches.

title: Riot Twitch Bot Website
description: The site I created allows everyone to recognise the RiotTwitchBot we're making.

title: Estate Website
description: The previous property site lacked the functionality to upload and retrieve images from MySql database. In this newly developed site, image operations have been rectified alongside the addition of filtering options. Furthermore, the website's aesthetics have been greatly improved.
